logentry.msg: The currency is now not taken from URL but from the currency of the basket - which is taken from the currency of the web pricing returned from the ERP JIRA: BR-9698

logentry.msg: fixes h3 fonts inside tabs on PDP, PFP ones are done JIRA: BR-7112

logentry.msg: Eliminate duplicate triplets from checkout ShipTo/BillTo Oracle address JIRA: BR-9659

logentry.msg: In urlrewrite.properties: 1. removed USD configuration for South Korea 2. removed redundant configuration for Bulgaria (channel does not exist) 3. removed redundant configuration for Greece (channel does not exist) JIRA: BR-9676

logentry.author: x155008
logentry.msg: Made changes so that for polling, International and Distributor channels' IDs are properly mapped between storefront and ERP values. Refactored some of the mapping utils and their use to reduce code duplication. JIRA: BR-9617

logentry.author: x154002
logentry.msg: ERP error code "ERP-NPR" is now treated as 'No connection available' JIRA: BR-9669

logentry.author: x153727
logentry.msg: replaces h3 with h2 header on PDP page. new template has been added JIRA: BR-9618

logentry.author: x155008
logentry.msg: I have changed the order submit button to be disabled from the beginning and to turn enabled only if P&A request succeeds. In this case, any script (such as automated GOMEZ scripts) should not be able to submit the order before P&A request returns. JIRA: BR-8731
